Text.Page:
I'm sorry I mocked you, . You're truly a mighty .

Apology accepted? Great! Could you help my friend Tarut? He's in dire need of brave s like you.

You're out of your mind walking into the jaws of death. Did you not see all the corpses and skeletons?

Well, I welcome any helping hand, especially if it's from Krok.

Welcome to a place sacred to every right-thinking aman!
